prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (athletic Chinese woman:1.2), muscular legs, determined focused expression, black ox-horn buns, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, visible muscle definition, individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching silk brocade fabric texture:1.2), sharp focus, cinematic lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, smooth skin, low quality, blurry face, deformed anatomy, exposed legs, short skirt, (thin build:1.3), messy hair
